question: Which one of the following is the main cause of the low productivity of rice in India?
explanation: For the low yield, there are many physical causes. Low yielding varieties of seeds is the major cause of low productivity of rice Shortage of water is also a cause of low productivity of rice. The irrigation water supplied to the crops does not meet the needs for optimum yield. The volume of water for the crop needs supply is not coordinated with the time pattern.
